title: When a homeless couple moved in with a millionaire
description: After living on the streets of California for a decade, Greg and Marie received a remarkable invitation.

title: 'Scared of heights' injury claimant filmed on Europe's biggest waterslide
description: Ben Bardsley was filmed on Europe's biggest waterslide after claiming an injury left him scared of heights.

title: Your pictures on the theme of 'paths'
description: Each week, we publish a gallery of readers' pictures on a set theme. This week it is "paths".

title: Derek Mackay: Scottish finance secretary quits over messages to boy
description: Derek Mackay admits he has "behaved foolishly" after a newspaper reports that he sent 270 messages to a 16-year-old boy.

title: Longer summer Premier League transfer window to return
description: Premier League clubs vote to change the summer transfer window to bring it in line with the rest of Europe.

title: Emergency law aims to stop next terror release
description: Mohammed Zahir Khan is due to be freed in three weeks' time after having served half of his sentence.

title: What are the rules for releasing terror offenders?
description: The government plans tougher laws for terror offences, but what will change?

title: Six Nations 2020: Centre Nick Tompkins will make his first Wales start against Ireland
description: Saracens centre Nick Tompkins will make his first Wales start against Ireland in Saturday's Six Nations trip to Dublin.

title: Germany AfD: Merkel rejects election of Thuringia PM
description: The AfD helped a liberal politician win the vote and the German chancellor says it is unforgivable.

title: Helen McCourt: Mother tells killer Ian Simms 'Give me my child back'
description: Marie McCourt wants "to give Helen the last goodbye" as her daughter's killer is released on parole.

title: Jameela Jamil announces she is ‘queer’ after backlash over TV role
description: The star comes out as queer after receiving criticism for being cast in an LGBT-interest show.

title: Youngs out as England make five changes for Scotland match
description: England coach Eddie Jones benches scrum-half Ben Youngs as part of five changes to his starting XV to face Scotland.

title: Kirk Douglas: Tributes paid to 'unforgettable' Hollywood 'icon'
description: Catherine Zeta-Jones, Steven Spielberg and more pay their respects to the late movie legend.

title: F1 will 'look to reschedule' Chinese GP if suspended because of coronavirus
description: Ross Brawn says Formula 1 will look to reschedule the Chinese Grand Prix if it cannot be held on its original date because of the coronavirus outbreak.

title: England bowler Archer to miss Sri Lanka tour with elbow injury
description: Jofra Archer will miss England's two-Test tour of Sri Lanka next month and the Indian Premier League after suffering a low-grade stress fracture of the elbow.

title: FA to restrict heading by under-18s
description: The FA is set to launch new coaching guidelines that will restrict the amount of heading by under-18 players in training.

title: School league tables: Boys behind girls for three decades
description: Use the BBC News postcode search to see how your school has done in this year's secondary league tables.

title: 'Scantily-clad models not our issue,' warns gambling regulator
description: An annual industry event continues to use promotional models wearing revealing outfits.

title: Christina Koch: Nasa astronaut sets new female space record
description: Nasa astronaut Christina Koch completes the longest-ever single spaceflight by a woman.

title: Coronavirus: Newborn becomes youngest person diagnosed with virus
description: The baby in Wuhan may have contracted the virus in the womb, or immediately after birth.

title: 'A turtle inspired us to tackle plastic pollution'
description: A couple who met while travelling say seeing the "scary" impact of rubbish spurred them into action.

title: The guys pimping rides for Michael Jordan, Deontay Wilder and Odell Beckham Jr
description: From vintage cars to $500,000 Lamborghinis, meet the guys who customise cars for the likes of WBC heavyweight champion Deontay Wilder and NFL star Odell Beckham Jr.

title: The Papers: Trump 'off the hook' after 'historic' trial
description: US President Donald Trump appears on Thursday's front pages following his impeachment trial acquittal.

title: William tackles mental health through football
description: Prince William has launched a new initiative aimed at normalising conversations about mental health.

title: 'My silent retreat obsession changed my life'
description: Gemma, 26, was stuck in a job she hated, struggling with stress and anxiety - then she discovered silent retreats.

title: Universal Credit: 'I went wild - and it hit me like a ton of bricks'
description: Paula thought the UK's new benefit system, Universal Credit, was great. At first.

title: Oscars 2020: Cressida Cowell 'crossing fingers' for How To Train Your Dragon 3
description: The Children's Laureate hopes the third film to be based on her books receives an Academy Award.

title: Blossoms are making hit singles - but the charts haven't noticed
description: The band are set to have a number one album this week, so why can't their singles crack the Top 40?

title: The silent epidemic of America’s problem with guns
description: Two thirds of American gun deaths are suicides. How do you solve a problem hardly anyone talks about?

title: Coronavirus: Does China have enough face masks to meet its needs?
description: China is reporting a shortage of face masks - what's the scale of the need and where do they come from?

title: Why do some people fear change to e-scooter laws?
description: Campaigners call for regulations ahead of a government consultation on the use of e-scooters.

title: The impeachment saga from beginning to end
description: For the better part of 2019, the impeachment saga has dominated Washington politics.

title: The town paying for people over 65 to get fit
description: A town in Finland is offering free gym sessions to everyone over the age of 65.

title: The Toronto studio behind the shoes on screen
description: Jitterbug Boy has crafted 17,000 pairs of footwear for film and TV productions.

title: Viewpoint: In this impeachment, people only heard what they wanted to
description: Key things we learnt from this rancorous impeachment trial, asks legal scholar Jonathan Turley.

title: Stockton care home residents take to the ice in wheelchairs
description: Residents from a care home in Stockton take to the rink in a special session with their carers.

title: My Money: A wedding, a pay rise and some healthy eating
description: As part of a new BBC blog series, Somi from Nigeria shares what she spent her money on this week.

title: Buses: Government unveils £50m plan to create first all-electric bus town
description: Local authorities can bid for the money to pay for a new fleet of up to 200 electric buses.

title: Kobe Bryant's final game was always unforgettable - now it is remembered in a special way
description: In the last game of Kobe Bryant's career the Los Angeles Lakers are 10 down with three minutes to go. What came next is now remembered in a very special way.
